Thanks a bunch AnnoX4. You are an awesome person for taking the time to post this here. I appreciate you.

How to reset your game progress:

In order to access your save file and/or world file, go to:
C:Documents and Settings[Your PC Username]Local SettingsApplication DataFLTSteam
Delete the contents of that folder and you're ready to begin a fresh adventure.
I'm on XP, so I'm unsure whether the path is the same for the Windows 7 and 8 folk.
I'm sure if you simply run a search for FLT (including hidden folders) you'll find it.

For some reason the slash didn't post in my last comment, here:
"C:/Documents and Settings/[Your PC Username]/Local Settings/Application Data/FLT/Steam"
